name: Chinchou
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.

attacks.name: Positive Ion
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If tails, this attack does 10 damage.

attacks.name: Negative Ion
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon attacks Chinchou during your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Chinchou is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance). (Benching or evolving either Pokémon ends this effect.)
